Title: Capital Radio 91.6 FM
Description: Capital Radio 91.6 FM is Sudan’s first Culture, art and Music radio station, established by a world Class Musician and DJ. Taha Al Roubi. It started broadcasting on July 19th 2012 with one mission in mind and that is to provide radical alternative to the universal formula of mainstream broadcasting. We feature programes made by musicians, artists and critics who represent the diversity of Sudan’s arts scenes, with regular contributions from Africa and around the world.
